Class BoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • desktop_board.BoardController

  • public final class BoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to GUI
    Author:
    Ronnie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BoardController()
      Contains service methods for board for controlling the board.

      void removeAllCars(java.lang.String name)
      Removes all the players cars from the board.
      If the car is not on the board, nothing happens.
      void removeCar(int fieldNumber, java.lang.String name)
      Removes a car from the board.
      If the car is not on the board, nothing happens.
      void removeOwner(int fieldNumber)
      Removes an owner from the field.
      If the field has no owner, nothing happens.
      void setBalance(java.lang.String name, int newBalance)
      Sets the balance of a player if the player has been added.
      void setCar(int fieldNumber, java.lang.String name)
      Places a car on the field.
      All cars can be placed on the same field.
      A car can only be placed if the corresponding player has been added.
      If a car is placed on the same field multiple times, nothing more happens.
      A car can not be placed on multiple fields simultaneously.
      void setChanceCard(java.lang.String txt) 
      void setDescriptionText(int fieldNumber, java.lang.String description)
      Sets the Description (The text shown in the center when mouse hovers) of a field on the board.

      Shows two dice on the board.

      Shows two dice on the board.
      void setHotel(int fieldNumber, boolean hasHotel)
      Sets whether or not a hotel should be on the street and removes all houses if any is present.
      void setHouses(int fieldNumber, int houseCount)
      Sets houses from the street, and removes the hotel if one is present.
      If houseCount is out of bounds, nothing happens.
      If the field is not a street, nothing happens.
      void setOwner(int fieldNumber, java.lang.String name)
      Sets an owner of a field.
      The field border will have the same color as the player.

      • getUserInteger

        public int getUserInteger(java.lang.String msg,
                          int min,
                          int max)
        Displays a message for the user and a textfield for the user to fill out. Only numbers are allowed if the number isn't in range the user can't press OK.
        Is a breaking call.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message for the user.
        min - The low end of the valid range (inclusive).
        max - The high end of the valid range (inclusive).
        Returns:
        The number entered by the user.

        Is a breaking call.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message for the user.
        buttonTexts - The labels on the buttons.
        Returns:
        The label of the button pressed by the user.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                      int balance)
        Adds a player to the board.
        A new player with the same color will replace the old.
        Max. 6 players.
        Parameters:
        name - : String (Mind the length!)
        balance - : int
        Automatic coloring

      • setBalance

        newBalance - : int

      • setDice

        public void setDice(int faceValue1,
                    int faceValue2)
        Shows two dice on the board. The dice will have the specified values, but the placement is random.
        Parameters:
        faceValue1 - : int [1:6]
        faceValue2 - : int [1:6]
        (If a faceValue is out of bounds nothing will happen!)

      • setDice

        public void setDice(int faceValue1,
                    int x1,
                    int y1,
                    int faceValue2,
                    int x2,
                    int y2)
        Shows two dice on the board. The dice will have the specified values and location.
        Parameters:
        faceValue1 - : int [1:6]
        x1 - : int [0:10]
        y1 - : int [0:10]
        faceValue2 - : int [1:6]
        x2 - : int [0:10]
        y2 - : int [0:10]

      • setDice

        public void setDice(int faceValue1,
                    int rotation1,
                    int faceValue2,
                    int rotation2)
        Shows two dice on the board. The dice will have the specified values, but the placement is random.
        Parameters:
        faceValue1 - : int [1:6]
        rotation1 - : int [0:2]
        faceValue2 - : int [1:6]
        rotation2 - : int [0:2]
        (If a faceValue is out of bounds nothing will happen!)

      • displayChanceCard

        public void displayChanceCard()

      • setCar

        public void setCar(int fieldNumber,
                   java.lang.String name)
        Places a car on the field.
        All cars can be placed on the same field.
        A car can only be placed if the corresponding player has been added.
        If a car is placed on the same field multiple times, nothing more happens.
        A car can not be placed on multiple fields simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]
        name - The name of the player

      • removeCar

        public void removeCar(int fieldNumber,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Removes a car from the board.
        If the car is not on the board, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]
        name - The name of the player

      • removeAllCars

        public void removeAllCars(java.lang.String name)
        Removes all the players cars from the board.
        If the car is not on the board, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player

      • setOwner

        public void setOwner(int fieldNumber,
                     java.lang.String name)
        Sets an owner of a field.
        The field border will have the same color as the player. The owners name will be printed in the subText. If the field is not a street, shipping or a brewery nothing happens.
        If the owner hasn't been added to the board, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]
        name - The name of the player

      • removeOwner

        public void removeOwner(int fieldNumber)
        Removes an owner from the field.
        If the field has no owner, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]

      • setHouses

        public void setHouses(int fieldNumber,
                      int houseCount)
        Sets houses from the street, and removes the hotel if one is present.
        If houseCount is out of bounds, nothing happens.
        If the field is not a street, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]
        houseCount - : int [0:4]

      • setHotel

        public void setHotel(int fieldNumber,
                     boolean hasHotel)
        Sets whether or not a hotel should be on the street and removes all houses if any is present.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - : int [1:40]
        hasHotel - : boolean
